Job Title: Senior Software Developer - C#, MVC, .NET, TFS, Angular JS etc.
Job Description: As a SELERANT Senior Software Developer, youll use the latest tools and technologies available to deliver state-of-the-art software. Youll be responsible for ensuring that company software components are expertly designed, tested, debugged, verified, and ready for integration into ours best-of-breed solutions for our clients improving their business outcomes in the global marketplace.Major areas of responsibilities:Develop and maintain the functionalities of the Selerant productsUnderstand new product requirements and translate them into designObtain and maintain deep understanding of Selerant's suite components in order to contribute to technical decisions including roadmapAct as a technical mentor for less experienced team membersWork with Product Area Architect as a contributor to overall architecture and technologyContribute to customer satisfaction and improved cooperation with Selerant Support teamEmploy Agile Development practicesCompetencies Required:More than 5 year experience in .NET developmentVery good knowledge of web development including C#, ASP.NET, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, XML, Web service, WebApi etcGood experience in .NET 4.0+, such as ASP.NET MVCFamiliar with Visual StudioGood experience in source control tool like TFSGood experience with SQL, PL-SQL (Oracle) T-SQL (Microsoft SQL)Good experience with ERP or PSI systems is a plus.Required Candidate profileNotice Period : Max of 30 days is preferable.
Doctorate: Any Doctorate in Any Specialization, Doctorate Not Required
